Author: Gateway#3763

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> One day, our IP address could be stolen and nobody on the internet can protect us from that, it's called a BGP attack and MyEtherWallet gets them all the time

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> many millions have been lost to BGP attacks against MEW
